page.title: 15HEMEL HEMPSTEAD HOUSING
page.content: Bennetts End, the second neighbourhood (after Adeyfield) to be developed by the New Town Commission, between the old paper industry to S.S.E and new indust. estate to N.W.,has much terracedand semidetached housing without garages. This causes congested on-street parking. Extensions with garages with garages now popular.Semis cost Â£40000,c.p.Â£55000in Leverstock Green village to N.E.,Â£49000in later built neighbourhoods to W. Â£45000 in Adeyfield (more central) Â£60000in Boxmoor (older, windward, characterful and links with Boxmoor Trust. Longdean Park is an 'executive estate' of over Â£100000 detached houses built in 1960s S.E.of Bennetts End with views over Abbot's Hill House grounds.Despite being near these, Northend Estate has lower priced low rise high density terraces, flats and semidetached house
